channel.title: Client wont log in
channel.description: It says error connecting to server. But when i try using moparscape it logged in but dced... I don't know how to change the ip for KronicScape317 client.... Help please.

item.title: Client wont log in
item.dc:creator: @Syme Syme
item.description:
@Syme wrote:

I know why, you coded something wrong, or your Server Ip is on others.
To Change your IP go to client’s gui.java.
Then Ctrl+F serverip then change it to 0.0.0.0
And if you coded something wrong, i just recommend for you to reset the Source by redownloading or re extracting

Read full topic
